metadata.title: face10ai.com - AI Face Attractiveness Analysis
metadata.description: Discover your attractiveness score with face10ai, based on symmetry, golden ratio, and scientific criteria. AI trained on thousands of faces.
metadata.keywords: face rating, AI analysis, attractiveness score, face symmetry, facial beauty, AI face score

hero.badge: DISCOVER YOUR ATTRACTIVENESS SCORE WITH AI
hero.tagline: Our artificial intelligence, trained on thousands of faces, analyzes your attractiveness with unmatched precision. Get your personalized score in seconds thanks to our deep learning model.
hero.subtext: Free trial without account • Instant results • 100% confidential

features.title: Features
features.smartAnalysisDesc: Our AI model has been trained on thousands of faces to evaluate your attractiveness with exceptional precision.
features.deepLearningDesc: Our advanced neural network identifies the facial features that determine attractiveness based on thousands of real examples.
features.aiRatingDesc: Receive a precise score generated by our artificial intelligence trained on a massive database of human faces.
features.totalPrivacyDesc: Your photos are never stored on our servers. Analysis is done locally to ensure your privacy.
features.instantResultsDesc: Receive your complete analysis in seconds thanks to our optimized and high-performance technology.
features.artificialIntelligenceDesc: Our model uses machine learning to analyze thousands of facial features and provide a reliable evaluation.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subheading: Discover what they think of our service
testimonials.testimonial1: I was curious to know my score and the results were very detailed! The AI is really impressive, you can see it was well trained.
testimonials.testimonial2: Fascinating application that uses real artificial intelligence. Knowing that the AI was trained on thousands of faces is reassuring about its reliability.
testimonials.testimonial3: Fast, accurate and totally confidential. The AI technology behind it is really advanced, the results are consistent!
testimonials.testimonial4: A truly unique experience! You can feel that the AI model learned from a huge database. The results are amazing.
testimonials.testimonial5: I tested with my friends and we were all surprised by the AI's accuracy. The referral system is great!
testimonials.testimonial6: Excellent application based on artificial intelligence. Instant results and privacy respect are perfect.

footer.description: Discover your attractiveness score with our advanced AI algorithm.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.heading: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Transparent and flexible pricing for all your AI analysis needs. Start for free or unlock the full potential with our premium plans.
pricing.offerDescription: Don't miss this unique opportunity! Take advantage of our exceptional 30% discount and unlock the full potential of our AI analysis.
pricing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our plans and pricing
pricing.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of users who trust our AI to analyze their attractiveness with precision.
pricing.faq1Question: How does the credit system work?
pricing.faq1Answer: Each face analysis uses 1 credit. The free plan gives you 5 credits for life. Pro and Premium plans automatically renew your credits each month (25 for Pro, 50 for Premium).
pricing.faq2Question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
pricing.faq2Answer: Yes, absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. You will keep access until the end of your current billing period.
pricing.faq3Question: What happens if I don't use all my credits?
pricing.faq3Answer: Free plan credits never expire. For Pro and Premium plans, unused credits do not carry over to the next month - you receive a new batch of credits each month.
pricing.faq4Question: Does the 30% discount only apply to the first month?
pricing.faq4Answer: No! This special offer applies as long as you maintain your active subscription. The reduced price will be your monthly rate as long as you stay subscribed.
pricing.faq5Answer: Absolutely. All your photos are analyzed locally and never stored on our servers. We take your privacy very seriously and use bank-level encryption.
pricing.faq6Answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be made immediately and we will adjust billing accordingly.
pricing.faq7Answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund, no questions asked.
pricing.faq8Question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq8Answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure payment processor Stripe.
pricing.pricingTestimonial1: The Pro plan is perfect for me. I use about 20 analyses per month and the price is really reasonable. The AI is impressive!
pricing.pricingTestimonial2: I started with the free plan and quickly upgraded to Premium. The VIP support and detailed analyses are really worth it.
pricing.pricingTestimonial3: The 30% discount makes the service even more attractive. I recommend the Pro plan to all my friends!
pricing.pricingTestimonial4: Excellent value for money. Monthly credits are more than enough for my needs and the analysis is always accurate.

about.title: About face10ai
about.description: face10ai is an AI-powered platform that analyzes facial attractiveness using advanced algorithms and deep learning.
about.methodologyDesc: Our AI analyzes your face based on three main criteria:
about.technologyDesc: We use cutting-edge AI models trained on thousands of faces to provide accurate and consistent results.
about.privacyDesc: Your photos are never stored. All analysis happens locally in your browser for maximum privacy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: face10ai.com only collects data necessary for the service:
privacy.section2Content: Your photos are never stored on our servers. Facial analysis is done entirely in your browser using face-api.js technology. Only a cryptographic hash of the image (to prevent duplicates) and analysis results are saved.
privacy.section3Content: Your data is used exclusively for:
section3Items: Managing the credits and referral system
privacy.section4Content: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal data to third parties. Your information remains strictly confidential.
privacy.section6Content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section7Content: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy.section8Content: For any questions about this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By using face10ai.com, you accept these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.section2Content: face10ai.com is an AI-based facial analysis service that evaluates attractiveness according to scientific criteria. The service is provided for informational and entertainment purposes only.
section3Items: Use the service legally and ethically
Not analyze photos of others without their consent
Not use the service for discriminatory purposes
Not attempt to circumvent service limitations
Not create fake accounts or abuse the referral system
terms.section4Content: Our service works with a credit system:
terms.section5Content: Results provided by our AI are for informational purposes only and do not constitute an objective evaluation of your attractiveness. face10ai.com cannot be held responsible for:
terms.section6Content: All content, logos, and technologies of face10ai.com are protected by copyright and belong to their respective owners.
terms.section7Content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time, with or without notice.
terms.section8Content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these terms of service.
terms.section9Content: These terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of French courts.
terms.section10Content: For any questions about these terms, contact us at
